content:
I'll guide you through the booking process, and provide the total cost including the upgrade to Main Cabin Extra.

**Booking Process:**

1. Go to American Airlines' website ([www.aa.com](http://www.aa.com)) and sign in to your AAdvantage account.
2. Click on "Book" and then "Flights" to start your search.
3. Enter your travel dates: July 25 (departure) and July 28 (return).
4. Select " ORD" (O'Hare International Airport) as your departure city and "LAS" (McCarran International Airport) as your destination.
5. Choose the flight option I mentioned earlier: Flight AA2402 (ORD-LAS) and Flight AA2405 (LAS-ORD).
6. Select "Main Cabin" as your fare type.
7. Click "Add to cart" and then "Checkout."
8. Review your booking details and click "Pay" to complete the transaction.

**Total Cost:**

* The total cost for the Basic Economy ticket is $214.60.
* To upgrade to Main Cabin Extra, you'll need to add $80 (2 x $40 per segment).
* The total cost with the Main Cabin Extra upgrade is $294.60.

**Breakdown:**

* Main Cabin ticket: $214.60
* Main Cabin Extra upgrade: $80
* Total: $294.60

**Payment and Confirmation:**

Once you've completed the booking process, you'll receive a confirmation email from American Airlines with your ticket details. You can also view your booking in your AAdvantage account.

**Important:**

* Make sure to review your booking details carefully before completing the transaction.
* If you need to make any changes to your booking, you can do so through American Airlines' website or by contacting their customer service.
* As a Platinum member, you'll earn 100% bonus miles on this flight, which will be credited to your AAdvantage account.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance with the booking process.
